trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per l'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating" />.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Creare un gestore per il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento quando si desidera personalizzare la modalità di autenticazione le credenziali dell'utente in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> classe fornisce i valori a qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando le proprietà disponibili in questa classe, è possibile recuperare le credenziali utente per personalizzare l'autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe genera il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento prima di convalidare le credenziali dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe costruisce un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> dell'oggetto e passa a un <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà per recuperare le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà può contenere valori aggiuntivi necessari per l'autenticazione, ad esempio un numero di identificazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> proprietà indica se le credenziali utente sono valide.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> proprietà per il risultato dell'autenticazione personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, si imposta la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> proprietà `true` se si hanno archiviato le credenziali dell'utente e non si desidera che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe per controllare le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi che passa il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valori a un provider di appartenenze personalizzato per convalidare le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valore restituito del <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> (metodo) e imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` in modo che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le credenziali utente sono valide.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le credenziali utente sono valide; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Se le credenziali utente in un gestore eventi per l'autenticazione di <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> set di eventi, il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> proprietà per indicare se le credenziali utente sono valide.

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se le credenziali utente siano valide e che è necessaria alcuna convalida aggiuntiva, impostare <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> a `true` e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> i passaggi di proprietà per indicare che il servizio di autenticazione deve ignorare il valore predefinito per l'autenticazione di un utente.

trans-unit.source: The value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> solo se classe <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> è `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe chiama il provider di appartenenze predefinito per convalidare le credenziali utente e quindi sovrascrive il valore in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi che passa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valori a un provider di appartenenze personalizzato per convalidare le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valore restituito del <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> (metodo) e imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` in modo che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le credenziali utente sono state autenticate.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se tutti i passaggi per la convalida delle credenziali utente sono stati eseguiti; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> proprietà che indica se la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe deve autenticare le credenziali dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> è `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza invece il valore in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> per determinare se creare un cookie di autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> è `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe convalida le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito e sovrascrive il valore di <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi che passa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valori a un provider di appartenenze personalizzato per convalidare le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valore restituito del <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> (metodo) e imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` in modo che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene valori dell'utente aggiuntivi per l'autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Valori necessari per l'autenticazione, diversi da nome utente e password.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà per recuperare i valori di autenticazione diverso dal nome utente e password durante il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'applicazione potrebbe essere configurata per convalidare un numero di identificazione con il nome utente e password.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il numero di identificazione verrà passato nel `CustomCredential` parametro del <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile recuperare il valore personalizzato tramite la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà contiene i valori personalizzati nello stesso formato in cui vengono passati per la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> gestore dell'evento, se più di un valore viene archiviato nella proprietà, è necessario analizzare il valore di <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà per recuperare i valori.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event that parses two authentication values from the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento che analizza i due valori di autenticazione dal <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: It passes the two values and the user name and password to a custom authentication class named `StudentAuthentication`.
trans-unit.target: Passa due valori e il nome utente e la password per una classe di autenticazione personalizzata denominata `StudentAuthentication`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la password per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: Password da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> proprietà per recuperare la password durante il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi che passa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valori a un provider di appartenenze personalizzato per convalidare le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valore restituito del <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> (metodo) e imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` in modo che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome autenticazione per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: Nome utente da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> proprietà per recuperare il nome di autenticazione durante la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that selects a membership provider to use based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un gestore eventi che consente di selezionare un provider di appartenenze da usare in base al valore del <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The handler passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to the custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore passa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> i valori per il provider di appartenenze personalizzato per convalidare le credenziali dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: It sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valore restituito del <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> (metodo) e imposta <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` in modo che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe non convalida le credenziali.
